title: Lotus of the Heart: Living Yoga for Personal Wellness and Global Survival
description: Interweaving sacred traditions with modern nutritional and environmental science, LOTUS OF THE HEART is a guidebook for living well in today's challenging world. Tracey Glover shows us how to release ourselves from the illusion of separation and see how we're truly connected to our neighbors, our families, nonhuman animals, and the environment.
author: Tracey Narayani Glover
